Exit to Community

REWORK
08 Sep 2020

A group of startup founders, investors, and thinkers are reimagining corporate ownership to take into account all of the people who help build the businessâ€”not just executives and investors, but customers, users, and suppliers. Their vision for Exit to Community is outlined in this zine, and two of its authors come on Rework to talk about their vision for a more equitable and inclusive end game for tech startups.
